body: Let's see Girl seems to get horny but guy doesn't budge then later on girl have a talk with cuck then cuck seduced her and took her virginity. My, what a shitty logic.

@yumi_san: yea, that kind of hentai logic completely baffles me, even if they aren't dating. Well, at least the authors have to do that to keep the story moving forward and show ppl the sex scenes, after all it's a hentai and we are all here to read about the juicy sex scenes.
